hero.heading_top: IBISUBIZO BY'INGUFU Z'IZUBA BYUBAKIYE KU BWIQWENYE
hero.title: Hesha Isi Yawe Urumuri.
hero.subtitle: Luminex ifasha ingo n'ibigo kugenzura, gucunga no kunoza sisitemu z'amashanyarazi yo ku zuba hakoreshejwe amakuru y’igihe nyacyo, isesengura rihanitse, n’iyubatsemo uburyo bw’ubwenge bwo gucunga bateri.

cards.fast_roi_desc: Igaruka mu myaka mike, si mu myaka myinshi

section.subtitle: Luminex ikemura imbogamizi zikomeye mu gukoresha ingufu z'izuba hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga rigezweho kandi ryatekerejwe neza.

weather.title: Ingufu Zihuzwa n'Iheherezo
weather.description: Amakuru y'ikirere n'ibipimo by'umusaruro w'izuba mu gihe nyacyo. Ubona inama z’ubwenge ku kubika no gusangira ingufu.

savings.title: Kunoza Umusanzu n'Ubukungu
savings.description: Bara uburyo uzigama mu gihe kirekire, umenye inyungu za Leta, kandi winjire mu mishinga y’ingufu rusange yo kugabanya ibiciro.

grid.title: Kwihuza n'Urugomero
grid.description: Wihuza n'urugomero byoroshye, winjize inyungu utanga ingufu, kandi ufasha mu kunganira ibyifuzo by’umuryango.

space.title: Guteza Imbere Uko Ahantu Hakoreshwa
space.description: Koresha AR mu gushaka ahantu heza ho gushyira panneaux. Winjire muri installations rusange ngo ugerweho n’akandi gakino.

environment.title: Ingaruka ku Bidukikije
environment.description: Kurikira uko ugabanya CO₂, ubone udukwibutsa two kubungabunga no kurengera ibidukikije.

policy.title: Amategeko n'Ingamba
policy.description: Menya amakuru mashya ku ngengo, amatangazo y’ingengo, n’amabwiriza. Komeza ukurikirane uko isoko ry'imirasire n’amabateri rihagaze.

performance.title: Igenzura ry'Imikorere
performance.description: AI itahura ibibazo by’ifu, igicucu, cyangwa imikorere mibi. Ubona inama zo kubungabunga ngo wongere ubushobozi.

features.section_subtitle: Byose ukeneye ngo unoze uburyo ukoresha ingufu z'izuba — byose muri app imwe yumvikana kandi yoroshye.

realtime.title: Dashboard y'Igihe Nyacyo
realtime.description: Genzura umusaruro w'izuba, ubushobozi bwa bateri, n'uko ukoresha amashanyarazi mu buryo bwihuse.

battery.title: Gucunga Bateri mu Bwenge
battery.description: AI igenzura igihe cyo gushyiramo no gusohora amashanyarazi kugira ngo ubuziranenge bwa bateri burusheho kumara igihe.

community.title: Gusangira Ingufu mu Muryango
community.description: Sangira cyangwa ugurishe ingufu zisagutse. Jya mu matsinda y’abaturage akoresha ingufu zisangiwe.

roi.title: Kugenzura ROI n'Ubwizigame
roi.description: Bara inyungu, ukurikirane uko uzigama buri kwezi, kandi umenye izindi nyungu ziboneka.

stats.title: Ibyo Twagezeho Birivugira
stats.subtitle: Imibare igaragaza uko Luminex ihindura ikoreshwa ry’ingufu mu Rwanda.
stats.long_term_savings: Ubwizigame bw’igihe kirekire kubera ikoreshwa ry’ingufu z’ubwenge.
stats.co2_reduced: 2.5t — Toni za CO₂ Zigabanuka Buri Mwaka

team.title: Sobanukirwa n'Itsinda rya Luminex
team.subtitle: Abahanga n'abashakashatsi biyemeje guteza imbere ibisubizo by’ingufu z'izuba mu Rwanda.

cta.title: Witeguye Guhindura Ejo Hawe?
cta.subtitle: Jya mu mpinduramatwara y’ingufu z'izuba mu Rwanda. Tangira kunoza ikoreshwa ry’ingufu ukoresha Luminex.

footer.description: Uburyo bw’ubwenge bwo gucunga ingufu z'izuba mu Rwanda — bushoboza abaturage gukoresha imbaraga z'izuba neza kandi ku buryo burambye.
